title: WebAssembly Adoption: Is Slow and Steady Winning the Race?
author: Richard Gall
description: We talk to a WebAssembly co-creator and other industry experts about its state of adoption, Java use cases, the importance of WASI, and more.
cntitle: WebAssembly 采用：缓慢而稳定是否能赢得比赛？
cndescription: 我们与 WebAssembly 联合创建者和其他行业专家探讨了其采用状态、Java 用例、WASI 的重要性等。
